title: From grass roots to green papers
brief_description: Activists in the Literacy movement got together with government representatives to develop policies and ideas regarding Literacy Issues in the International Literacy Year. The 13th National conference of the Australian Council for Adult Literacy was held in August 1989 in Tasmania.
